mapper.select: select log.id as id, log.shop_shipping_no as shopShippingNo, log.company_code as companyCode, log.company as company, log.`number` as number, log.context as context, log.area_code as areaCode, log.area_name as areaName, log.shipping_money as shippingMoney, log.status as status, log.is_check as isCheck, log.log_at as logAt, log.created_time as createdTime, log.updated_time as updatedTime from mall_shop_shipping_log log where log.shop_shipping_no=#{shopShippingNo} order by log.id
mapper.insert:
insert into mall_shop_shipping_log ( shop_shipping_no, company_code, company, `number`, context, shipping_money, status, is_check, log_at ) values
( #{dto.shopShippingNo}, #{dto.companyCode}, #{dto.company}, #{dto.number}, #{dto.context}, #{dto.shippingMoney}, #{dto.status}, #{dto.isCheck}, #{dto.logAt} )
